dtr.title: Diurnal Temperature Range
dtr.description: Daily temperature range (T_max - T_min). High values indicate clear/dry conditions.

t_max_diurnal.title: Maximum Temperature (24h)
t_max_diurnal.description: Maximum 2m temperature over the forecast period.

t_min_diurnal.title: Minimum Temperature (24h)
t_min_diurnal.description: Minimum 2m temperature over the forecast period.

t_mean_diurnal.title: Mean Temperature (24h)
t_mean_diurnal.description: Mean 2m temperature over the forecast period.

day_night_diff.title: Day-Night Temperature Difference
day_night_diff.description: Afternoon minus overnight temperature. High values = strong diurnal cycle.

heating_rate.title: Morning Heating Rate
heating_rate.description: Rate of temperature increase during morning hours. High values = rapid destabilization.

cooling_rate.title: Evening Cooling Rate
cooling_rate.description: Rate of temperature decrease during evening. High values = clear/dry conditions.

diurnal_amplitude.title: Diurnal Temperature Amplitude
diurnal_amplitude.description: Half the diurnal range - useful for harmonic analysis.

hour_of_max_temp.title: Hour of Maximum Temperature
hour_of_max_temp.description: Forecast hour when T_max occurs. Earlier = drier conditions.

hour_of_min_temp.title: Hour of Minimum Temperature
hour_of_min_temp.description: Forecast hour when T_min occurs. Typically around sunrise.
